author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-2544: Disable SecurityPolicyReloadingTest because it fails in the tinderbox environment on java 6 when run in the suite.

author: mriou
msg: Bug fix in complex typed variables assignment and one more test case that goes with it. As a general rule of thumb the doc.createElement method should *never* be used in ODE as we use ns elements extensively and such a node will produce a null local name. Instead use doc.createElementNS(null, "foo").

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-2193: Add line numbers and file names to import error messages.
